version_description:
• View data usage of your 4G LTE connection
• Activate FUP data extension packages
Added support for new LTE number series

# Fully upgraded user interface to make the features even more simplified
# Manage your Home Broadband account & check bill information
# Data package activation & change
# Billing history of Calls, SMS, MMS and Data
# Connection status check
# Feature to Like and Share the Dialog Selfcare app on Facebook
# Updated Dialog outlet location information & many more
Bug fixes and improvements

The Dialog Self Care App has now given more power to you to control all of your Dialog services using one App with its latest addition of Star Points feature!

You can Check points balance, redeem points to pay your Mobile, Dialog Television or Fixed Line bills, Transfer points within mobile connections registered under your NIC, FlySmiles or to HSBC Rewards, In addition you can donate points HelpAge Sri Lanka, SOS Village, My Friend or Unicef & Subscribe to Star Points promotional alerts via SMS.

The Dialog Self-Care app has now given more power to you to control over 50 Dialog services using one app with its latest addition of eZ cash, My Plan and Hybrid feature.

eZ Cash
======
-Check eZ cash wallet balance
-Money transfer
-Make payment such as Dialog bill payment, utility payment, institutional payment and merchant payment
-Change PIN
-Information on service charges
-Mini statement

• Balance of Prepaid services for postpaid wallet balance
